title: (VIDEO) Iraj’s Kirulapone residence vandalized
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Music producer Iraj Weeraratne’s Kirulapone residence was attacked by a group on Tuesday (10) evening.
Iraj Weeraratne said that a group visited his residence at around 6:30 PM and cause serious destruction to the property.
“This is my mother’s residence. They have even destroyed the entire washroom,” an emotional Weeraratne told News 1st.
Iraj Weeraratne said the group that broke into his residence also committed theft.
